title: Translation into Slovak language
body: Hi, i like this game and the idea of secuso. Can i contribute with translation into slovak lng?

title: Optimize for landscape orientation
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
Hi would be nice if the memory tiles wouldn't be so small when playing in landscape.

Thank you, take care.

title: Every round is a highscore
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
Even if I had a highscore of e.g. 2500, every time a game ends it shows "highscore: xxxxx", even if it's a smaller value than the highscore in the highscore list. 

It would be nice to see the score of the round and the highscore separately.

title: Add tutorial
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body: Change Welcome Dialog to tutorial

title: When score is below highscore, it is not shown at the end of the game.
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body: Instead it is shown as "Highscore: 0"

title: FR: Include metadata for fdroid
body:
When providing metadata via a fastlane directory, fdroid automaticly shows them in the store. You dont need to install fastlane, just create the folder

Example: https://github.com/Freeyourgadget/Gadgetbridge/tree/master/fastlane/metadata/android/en-US
Info: https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/2.28.7/supply/README.md#images-and-screenshots

title: FR: Adaptive icon
body:
Api 26 introduced adaptive icons where background and foreground are two different images.
https://developer.android.com/guide/practices/ui_guidelines/icon_design_adaptive.html

title: Make colorPrimaryDark darker
body:
The status bar should be darker than the action bar.

Before:
![screenshot_2017-10-25-15-45-35](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22525368/32001915-6f70a35c-b99b-11e7-93bb-9196bbca72b4.png)
After:
![screenshot_2017-10-25-15-44-47](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22525368/32001914-6f4d701c-b99b-11e7-87d8-f519504c18cf.png)

title: [WIP] Adjust colors of drawer icons.
body:
The icons in the drawer have different colors, some are darker than other. I adjusted the settings icon by removing its alpha value, but I couldn't change the color of the highscore icon.
With this PR it should be red (just to be sure to see the difference), but it is still grey.

title: Dead link in readme
body: The link https://design.google/icons/index.html is now a 404.

body: My first pull request

title: FR: xkcd deck
body: You could use character picuteres from here: http://www.explainxkcd.com/wiki/index.php/Characters

title: Create strings.xml
body: Here is the French translation :D

title: Copyright violation
body:
Hi @SecUSo

I found [this app ](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.game.PuzzleMemory) on the Google Play Store. This guys just took the source code, added some ads and put it on the Store...

As you are the owner of the source code, feel free to open a request to google [here](https://support.google.com/legal/contact/lr_dmca?product=googleplay) to remove the false app from the Store, if it's your wish ;)

Don't forget to tell Google that:

* The app is licensed under GNU GPL v3 and this guy is violating it by distributing the app without distributing the source code;
* He is falsely claiming he made the app;
* Also tell them that this guy has done the same thing already with other apps. Probably this is worth mentioning. (I watch him)

title: Two pairs of same image
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body: Game in easy mode, had two pairs of monkeys, but only certain two paired together.

title: Android automatic refactor - ObsoleteLayoutParam
body:
Hi,

I am developing a tool to automatically refactor Android applications with the goal of improving energy efficiency.
This pull request has the changes generated while applying the rule "ObsoleteLayoutParam".

While developing your application's views you might be specifying attributes in a view's artefact that are not necessary due to the nature of its parent. In this PR, those attributes were replaced by a comment.

I have made a previous validation of the changes and they seem correct.
Unfortunately, this tool is not able keep the original whitespace of the files, so comparison without ignoring whitespace might be confusing.
Please consider the changes and let me know if you agree with them.

Best,
Luis

title: Android automatic refactor - ViewHolder
body:
Hi,

I am developing a tool to automatically refactor Android applications with the goal of improving energy efficiency.
This pull request has the changes generated while applying the rule "ViewHolder".

When developing list views, it is very common to repeat work in every item. Something very common is retrieving a field with the API method ```findViewById```. There is a ViewHolder pattern that lets you reuse the work made in the previous computed item.

I have made a previous validation of the changes and they seem correct.
Please consider them and let me know if you agree with them.

Best,
Luis

title: Add possibility to start new game from win screen
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: When a game is finished there is no direct option to start a new game without accessing the main menu first.

title: Hide found pairs
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: It should be possible to choose in the settings whether found pairs are displayed or not.

title: Dev
body: Ready for first release
